thread.title: Civic mindedness competes with slime at Kids' Choice Awards

title: Civic mindedness competes with slime at Kids' Choice Awards
text:
Civic mindedness competes with slime at Kids' Choice Awards Monday, March 26, 2018 - 01:15 
While celebrities did get covered in slime, the hot topic of the night was the March for Our Lives protests which took place around the globe. Saskia O'Donoghue reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
While celebrities did get covered in slime, the hot topic of the night was the March for Our Lives protests which took place around the globe. Saskia O'Donoghue reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2GqCg5l
